snippet: GREENE--Phyllis, on July 9, 2016 after a long and full life. Beloved mother, grandmother, sister, aunt, and friend. Services Wednesday, July 13, 2016 at 11am at Riverside Nassau North Chapel, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: GREENE--Phyllis, on July 9, 2016 after a long and full life. Beloved mother, grandmother, sister, aunt, and friend. Services Wednesday, July 13, 2016 at 11am at Riverside Nassau North Chapel, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY. 1/3
